definitions.text: footwear that covers the whole foot and lower leg
British term for the luggage compartment in a car
the swift release of a store of affective force
examples: they got a great bang out of it
he got a quick rush from injecting heroin

definitions.text: protective casing for something that resembles a leg
an instrument of torture that is used to heat or crush the foot and leg
a form of foot torture in which the feet are encased in iron and slowly crushed
the act of delivering a blow with the foot
examples: he gave the ball a powerful kick

definitions.text: cause to load (an operating system) and start the initial processes
